name: ComparatorChain_equalsTest
description: Unit tests for the equals method of the ComparatorChain class.

test_cases.name: testEquals_SameInstance
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with the same instance.

test_cases.name: testEquals_NullObject
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with a null object.

test_cases.name: testEquals_DifferentClass
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with an object of a different class.

test_cases.name: testEquals_SameClassDifferentState
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with instances of the same class but different states.

test_cases.name: testEquals_SameClassSameState
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method with instances of the same class and same state.
